events.name: Retire LIBS
events.wd_description: Massive number of LIBS will likely retire and enter the waste stream in the near future.
events.description: Massive number of LIBS will likely retire and enter the waste stream in the near future.

events.name: Handle End-of-Life LIBs
events.wd_description: The effective utilization of retired LIBs, which still remain about 70-80% of the initial capacity.
events.description: The effective utilization of retired LIBs, which still remain about 70-80% of the initial capacity.

events.name: Circular Value Chain of Spent LIBs
events.wd_label: Circular Value Chain of Spent LIBs
events.wd_description: Provides a systematic discussion on the circular value chain (CVC) of spent LIBs.
events.description: Provides a systematic discussion on the circular value chain (CVC) of spent LIBs.

events.name: Redesign Products
events.wd_description: Implement product redesign to minimize waste generation.
events.description: Implement product redesign to minimize waste generation.

events.name: Repurpose process
events.wd_description: A thorough summary of key issues and applications of the repurpose process for spent LIBs.
events.description: A thorough summary of key issues and applications of the repurpose process for spent LIBs.

events.name: Key issues and applications in the repurpose process
events.description: A thorough summary of the key issues and applications in the process of repurposing spent LIBs.

events.name: Regulation and standardization
events.wd_description: Improving regulation and standardization processes to support sustainable circular value chains for spent LIBs.
events.description: Improving regulation and standardization processes to support sustainable circular value chains for spent LIBs.

events.name: Regulation and standardization improvement
events.description: Improvement of regulation and standardization processes is necessary for sustainable CVC.
